description: A majority of voters are against President Trump’s plans to close the Education Department, according to a new poll from Quinnipiac University.   The survey released Thursday found 60 percent of voters oppose such plans, while 33 percent support the president’s goal of abolishing the federal agency.   Democrats strongly oppose the dismantling of the…
title: 60 percent oppose Trump plan to close Education Department: Survey

description: Protesters opposed to the detention of Palestinian activist Mahmoud Khalil filled up Trump Tower in New York City on Thursday.  The protesters, from the progressive, anti-Zionist group Jewish Voice for Peace, chanted “bring Mahmoud home now” while wearing red shirts reading “Jews say stop arming Israel” and holding banners.  Police warned the protesters to leave…
title: Khalil protesters fill up Trump Tower

description: The S&P 500 index sunk into correction territory Thursday, falling 10 percent in less than a month from a record high. The S&P was down 1.4 percent shortly before 1:30 EST, falling to just more than 5,512. That level is roughly 10 percent below the key index’s most recent record high of 6,144.15, which was…
title: S&P 500 hits correction territory as Wall Street woes deepen

description: The Corporate Sustainability Due Diligence Directive seeks to impose environmental, social, and governance (ESG) mandates on businesses worldwide.
title: A radical European law could devastate the U.S. economy

description: Comcast has reached a multiyear agreement with the International Olympic Committee (IOC) to broadcast the games on all platforms in the United States for the Olympic Games through to 2036, meaning they will stay with NBC and Peacock for the foreseeable future. The deal, which was approved by the IOC Executive Board this week, will begin…
title: Comcast, IOC reach multibillion dollar agreement on Olympic broadcast rights

description: Former New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio (D) said Thursday that Democrats lacked a clear message during the 2024 campaign cycle, leading in part to their defeat in the race for the White House. In an interview on Fox News Channel’s “America’s Newsroom,” the progressive pushed back on the suggestion that the Democratic Party’s…
title: De Blasio: ‘Unclear’ message hurt Democrats in 2024

description: DOGE, created with a focus on efficiency and waste reduction, has identified $105 billion in taxpayer savings, and IGs should consider reforming their practices to include separate headquarters and a focus on waste, fraud and abuse.
title: Get out, get back, get real: What inspectors general should learn from DOGE

description: A U.S. Customs and Border Protection (CBP) employee was accused of a scheme to defraud the Federal Emergency Management Agency (FEMA), the Department of Justice (DOJ) said in a Wednesday release. According to the release, Serina Baker-Hill, of Detroit, was charged with allegedly attempting to defraud FEMA and lying to federal agents. Baker-Hill, 55, was…
title: Customs employee accused of scheme to defraud FEMA

description: MSNBC host Lawrence O’Donnell announced he’d be taking a week off from his nightly show, citing his “exhaustion” with the first few weeks of President Trump’s second term. “I’m exhausted at day 52, and so I’m going to take next week off. And I’m telling you that now because I know you don’t like it…
title: Lawrence O’Donnell on break: ‘I’m exhausted at day 52’ of Trump administration

description: The Trump administration’s plans to detain migrants in Guantánamo Bay, Cuba, hit another roadblock this week after all 40 such individuals held there were sent back to the United States, with no future deportation flights scheduled to the island. A defense official confirmed to The Hill Thursday there are “zero” migrants being held at Naval…
title: Trump administration empties Guantánamo of migrants, flies all back to US

description: President Trump is scheduled to meet with NATO Secretary General Mark Rutte around noon on Thursday. The meeting comes as Trump demands that European countries spend more on their own security, including the ongoing costs of supporting Ukraine’s defensive war against Russia. Rutte has sought to keep the world’s most powerful military alliance united as…
title: Watch: Trump meets with NATO secretary general Mark Rutte
